reasoning.overall: This outfit strikes the perfect balance of professional authority and approachability for a client-facing business meeting. The classic navy blazer and white shirt combination is timeless and universally appropriate in conservative business settings.
reasoning.formalityMatch: Target formality: 8-9 (business formal). Achieved: 8.5. The combination is appropriately formal without being stuffy.
reasoning.colorCoordination: Navy and charcoal create a sophisticated, complementary neutral base. White provides contrast and crispness. Burgundy belt adds a subtle touch of warmth without being distracting.
reasoning.weatherAppropriateness: Perfect for 65Â°F partly cloudy conditions. Blazer provides light warmth for indoor AC and outdoor comfort. Wool blend breathes well.
reasoning.occasionFit: Ideal for client presentations. Conservative enough for traditional industries, polished enough to convey competence and professionalism.
styleNotes: Keep blazer buttoned when standing, unbuttoned when seated
Ensure shirt cuffs extend slightly beyond blazer sleeves
Belt should match shoe leather tone
Consider pocket square for added polish (optional)
